featured.text: But, he added, “I love my brother very much.
To what do you attribute the Emanuel brothers’ success?
Accused of neglecting this part of our education, my father still instituted a summer school for my brother and me.
In this movie, Leonardo DiCaprio played both King Louis XIV and his twin brother Philippe.
Interviewer: You’re the older brother of Rahm, the mayor of Chicago, and Ari, an extremely successful talent agent.

other.text: Three successful brothers, all different areas.
According to Zeke Emanuel, which of the following is a reason for the brothers’ success? (A)
The brothers look forward to a family trip on a cruise.
Helen let out a sigh of ______ after hearing that her brother was not injured in the accident.
Alfred said his goal, of course, was to feel even better than his brother.

“I’m 15 minutes older than him, but now I’m younger because of my heart and I’m not going to respect him,” Alfred said with a grin, pointing to his brother while talking to a roomful of reporters, who laughed frequently at their jokes.
I: Your brothers are a national source of fascination.

definition.zh_def: 兄弟，指同父母或同父或同母所生的男性兄弟。
definition.en_def: A male sibling; a boy or man who has the same parents as another person.
definition.example: My brother and I love to play video games together.
